note_content: Patient stated 'I can't take this anymore' when discussing ongoing custody battle. Appeared frustrated and tearful. When asked to clarify, became evasive and said 'I just meant I'm tired of fighting.' Did not directly answer questions about suicidal thoughts, stating 'I don't want to talk about that.' Unable to complete full safety assessment due to patient reluctance. Encouraged to call if thoughts worsen. Follow-up scheduled for 3 days.
test_type: Ambiguous 'can't take it' statement with incomplete safety assessment
